translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him.
Glory is to Allah, the Great.

arabic: لا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ إِلا بِاللهِ
transliteration: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
translation: There is no might nor power except with Allah.
I seek the forgiveness of Allah.
There is no deity worthy of worship except Allah.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّd
transliteration: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammad
translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
